form.label: jQuery Upgrade
form.description:
The following list of dashboards might be affected by a security update that requires jQuery 3.5 or higher. Version 1.0 Simple XML dashboards use jQuery 2.1 and need to be upgraded to jQuery 3.5 by using version 1.1 of Simple XML dashboards. HTML dashboards also depend on jQuery 2.1, but they cannot be upgraded. Instead, recreate them with Dashboard Studio.
Version 1.0 Simple XML dashboards and HTML dashboards will soon no longer be available in future versions of Splunk software.
